hero.title: Your Ultimate Online Tech Store Is Coming Soon!

products.name: Jbl Flip 6 Waterproof Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - Black
products.description:
The beat goes on with the JBL Flip 6 2-way speaker system, engineered to deliver loud, crystal clear, powerful sound. Its racetrack-shaped woofer delivers exceptional low frequencies and midrange, while a separate tweeter produces crisp, clear high-frequencies. Flip 6 also features optimized dual passive radiators for deep bass, fine-tuned with using Harman's advanced algorithm.
Bold audio meets bold design. Big-sounding yet easy to carry, the design fits any personal style. Stand it vertical or horizontal and choose from a variety of vibrant colors.
To the pool. To the park. JBL Flip 6 is IP67 waterproof and dustproof, so you can bring your speaker anywhere.
Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery. JBL Flip 6 gives you up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge.
features: Wireless Bluetooth streaming
12 hours of playtime
IPX7 waterproof
Pair multiple speakers with party boost
Premium sound quality
Connector type: 3.5 millimeter stereo
Power source type: Battery powered
Included components: Quick start guide

products.name: Jbl Xtreme 4 Portable Bluetooth Speaker
products.description:
Next-Level Massive JBL Pro Sound

Immerse yourself in powerful audio with the JBL Xtreme 4. Equipped with two woofers, two powerful drivers, and dual pumping JBL Bass Radiators, it delivers a dynamic soundscape with deep bass and exceptional clarity. Get lost in the music wherever you are.

Designed for Adventure
Carry it effortlessly with the convenient, adjustable shoulder strap (wear it on your shoulder or as a crossbody) and enjoy practical features like a built-in bottle opener.

All-Day Playtime
With up to 24 hours of battery life and an extra 6 hours available with Playtime Boost your music can last from sunrise to sunset and beyond. This feature also tunes the performance for louder, crisper sound.

Color Variations: Green, Black, Blue.
features: Powerful JBL Pro Sound with dual woofers and dual tweeters
Deep bass from dual JBL passive radiators
Waterproof, dustproof and shockproof design
Built-in power bank to charge your devices
Up to 24 hours of playtime on a single charge

products.name: Jbl Go 3 Portable Speaker
products.description:
JBL Go 3: Bold Sound, Bold Style.

Elevate your every day with the JBL Go 3. Featuring JBL Pro Sound in an eye-catching, edgy design, it's the perfect fusion of style and performance. With colorful fabrics and expressive details, it's a must-have accessory for any outing.

Surprisingly Powerful Audio
Don't let its size fool you. The Go 3 delivers rich, powerful sound and punchy bass that brings your music to life.

Built for Adventure
An integrated loop makes it easy to carry, while an IP67 rating means it's completely waterproof and dustproof. From the beach to the park, your music is protected.

Style that Sounds as Good as it Looks
Inspired by street fashion, the Go 3 comes in vibrant new color combinations that look as great as they sound.
features: JBL Pro Sound: Powerful audio and punchy bass from a compact speaker.
Stylish & Portable: A design that goes great with the latest styles.
All-Weather Ready: IP67 waterproof and dustproof.
Wireless Streaming: Connects easily to your devices via Bluetooth.
5-Hour Playtime: Battery-powered for all-day entertainment.

products.name: JBL Go 4
products.description:
Ultra-portable JBL Pro Sound with punchier bass
Don't let its little size fool you. The JBL Go 4 packs a serious musical punch, delivering big JBL Pro Sound with punchy bass. Your friends won't believe how much great JBL Pro Sound comes out of such a small speaker. 
Up to 7 hours of playtime plus 2 hours with Playtime Boost
Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery. JBL Go 4 gives you up to 7 hours of playtime on a single charge. Simply tap Playtime Boost to prolong the playtime, adding up to 2 hours to your battery life. It tunes and optimizes the performance for louder and crisper sound. 
Waterproof and dustproof
The JBL Go 4's IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating ensures this portable speaker can handle almost any environment, from a poolside party to a seaside picnic.
features: JBL Go 4: Ultra-Portable Pro Sound with Enhanced Bass
Extended Playtime: 7 Hours + 2 Hour Playtime Boost on JBL Go 4
IP67 Waterproof & Dustproof JBL Go 4: Adventure-Ready Audio
Auracast Multi-Speaker Connection: JBL Go 4 Stereo & Beyond
Eco-Friendly JBL Go 4: Made with Recycled Materials
Compact & Powerful: JBL Go 4 Portable Bluetooth Speaker

products.name: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G -4GB RAM/ 128GB ROM Android 15 - Black
products.description:
Samsung Galaxy A17 5G

6.7 FHD+ Super AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 800 nits peak brightness for crisp outdoor viewing; 5,000mAh battery with 25W fast charging that replenishes half capacity in minutes; and a camera system with a 50MP main sensor with optical image stabilization (OIS) for capturing sharp images even on the move.
